person.persName: John Pearce (Green County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier 13th KY)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier. Green County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Pearce and Lettie Pearce. Resident of Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmhand in Green County in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from December 31, 1861 to December 5, 1863. Wounded at the Battle of Huff's Ferry, Roane County, Tennessee, on November 14, 1863. Died in Knoxville, Knox County, Tennessee, on December 5, 1863, from wounds received at the Battle of Huff's Ferry.
